column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////It seems as if the service
column3: and culture is inconsistent. My first visit here was great. However we had a very disappointing experience this morning. The manager was rude and unaccommodating when I asked if my eggs could be cooked a little longer. She said no
column4: that it was PRE MADE this morning and there was nothing she could do about changing the chef's dish. So much for being fresh and cooked to order! The manager claimed that it was on the menu and she could prove that it was a soft poached egg....yeah I looked at the menu
column5: it was fried. Why even say something like that though!? She didn't offer anything
column6: so ended up with a overly spicy
column7: egg yolk mush. Mmm delicious. We will not be returning.
